title: The Huntsman Takes Snow White: A First-Time Fairytale
description: And then, a year of hell. A year of seeing her in fits and snatches, always indoors, always in company, never more than a few moments. The carefully studied disdain in her voice when she spoke to him. The concealed wound deep in her eyes… and behind her, the Queen. Watching. Always watching. Every morning, Roget had carefully hardened his heart. He was too old, too low-born, too fond of his own company. Too dark - featured, too glowering… and too full of a love that would leave the both of them dead. Every night, he would dream of her. Her laugh, her gaze, her name soft in his mouth. Snow White.  Jacques Roget knows that his love for the girl is impossible - unimaginable. And when the Queen gives him a terrible task to fulfill, he knows that it's time to do what he should have done a year ago - take her somewhere far away, and leave her there. But best-laid plans rarely unfold exactly as they should... and perhaps the innocent princess of Roget's fantasies has been hiding some less - than virginal secrets...
author: Felicia Greene
